quotes.quote: Depression is not a sign of weakness. It’s a sign of having been strong for too long.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You are not defined by your depression. You are more than that.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It’s okay to rest. It’s okay to take a break. It’s okay to not be okay.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Depression makes you believe you’re not worthy of happiness. But happiness is within reach if you keep trying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You’re not broken. You’re just going through a difficult chapter of your life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You will rise again, stronger than ever.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When you're feeling down, just remember that healing is a process. Take it one step at a time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Healing takes time, and that’s okay.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Even the darkest clouds eventually pass.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t give up. The worst is just a chapter in your story, not the whole story.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your journey is not over. Keep going, you are capable of overcoming this.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When you feel like giving up, remember why you started in the first place.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You are not alone in this. There are people who care about you, even if you don’t always feel it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the bravest thing you can do is to keep going when you don’t feel like it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Just because you’re struggling doesn’t mean you’re failing. It means you’re growing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Be gentle with yourself. You’re doing the best you can.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Healing is not linear, and that’s okay.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A good deed is never lost. He who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.

quotes.quote: You can’t go through life with a ‘do it yourself’ attitude. You need help, and it’s okay to ask for it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is an appalling waste of energy; you can’t build on it; it’s only good for wallowing in.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: Don’t cry over the past, it’s gone. Don’t stress about the future, it hasn’t arrived. Live in the present and make it beautiful.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only thing you will regret is not trying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.author: Sydney Harris

quotes.quote: You should never regret anything in life. If it’s good, it’s wonderful. If it’s bad, it’s experience.
quotes.author: Victoria Holt

quotes.quote: Regret is a form of self-pity.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I don’t regret the things I’ve done, I regret the things I didn’t do when I had the chance.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never regret anything that made you smile.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The only thing more exhausting than the pursuit of success is the pursuit of regret.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is the worst thing in the world. Learn from your mistakes, but don't live with regret.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is the natural impulse to deny your past, to get away from the choices you made.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you regret something, it means you didn’t learn enough from it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t regret anything you’ve done, because in the end it makes you who you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: To regret deeply is to live in the past. To regret lightly is to hold onto your lessons without dwelling in sorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life is too short to regret, so don’t. Learn, grow, and move on.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only time you should ever look back is to see how far you’ve come.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is like a poison. It can destroy your spirit and your joy. Let go of the past and move forward.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is for the past; hope is for the future. Live in the present and keep going forward.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It’s not what you do that makes you regret, it’s what you don’t do.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is just the realization that you could have done better.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never regret a day in your life. Good days give happiness, bad days give experience.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is a cruel and bitter thing, but it also teaches us how to live better.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t regret the past, it’s done. Don’t worry about the future, it’s uncertain. Live in the present and create your own joy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A life without regrets is a life of not trying anything new.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only regrets in life are the risks you didn’t take.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret means you cared. It means you tried, loved, and lived fully.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is a tool to sharpen your mind. Use it, but never allow it to imprison you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You can’t move forward if you keep looking back. Don’t regret the past, use it to make a better future.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret doesn’t empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it only empties today of its joy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The road to regret is paved with good intentions.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret comes from fear. Fear of failure, fear of mistakes, fear of being judged.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you regret something, let it go. Don’t drag it around with you for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is like a shadow. It follows you, but it can’t harm you unless you let it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life’s regrets are lessons learned that we can’t unlearn.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The regrets you have today are the things you didn’t do yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t let the past steal your present. Regret nothing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: We must learn from the past, but we can’t live in it. Don’t regret what is behind you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is just a form of wasted energy. Don’t spend your time there.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You can’t regret things you can’t change, so let it go and move on.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only true failure is regret. Learn from the past, and don’t dwell on it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is a teacher that opens your eyes to see what you can do better next time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t waste time regretting things you can’t control.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is a reminder that you are human, that you tried and learned, and that you can do better next time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is a powerful emotion, but don’t let it define you. Use it to become stronger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret is not the opposite of success, it’s the path to learning and growth.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t regret the mistakes you made, let them teach you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret should teach you, not torment you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret teaches us to let go of the past and focus on what we can change today.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Regret makes you realize your mistakes, but it shouldn’t make you afraid of making new ones.

quotes.quote: Faith is the belief that something good is going to come, even in the midst of challenges.

quotes.quote: Faith is the belief in yourself and your ability to overcome any obstacle.

quotes.quote: Faith is the knowledge that something better awaits you, even when you feel lost.

quotes.quote: Faith is the belief in your dreams, even when others don’t believe in them.

quotes.quote: Faith is knowing that challenges are temporary, and that victory is ahead.

quotes.quote: Faith is the bridge between where you are and where you want to be.

quotes.quote: Faith is the light that helps us navigate through life’s darkest moments.

quotes.quote: Faith is the foundation of resilience in the face of adversity.

quotes.quote: Faith is the belief that no matter how many storms we face, the sun will shine again.

quotes.quote: Faith is the courage to believe in the impossible.

quotes.quote: Faith is the path that leads us to the most incredible opportunities.

quotes.quote: Faith is the ability to take risks, trusting that something good will come out of it.

quotes.quote: Faith is the belief that the universe is unfolding as it should.

quotes.quote: Faith is the trust that your journey is meant to be.

quotes.quote: Faith is the assurance that, no matter what, everything will be okay in the end.

quotes.quote: Faith is knowing that no matter what happens, you are in God’s hands.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is what gives us the strength to get back up when we fall down.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is the belief that tomorrow will be better than today.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is what carries us through the toughest of times.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is the trust that no matter what happens, God has a plan for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is the belief that every setback is a setup for a comeback.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is believing that good things are going to happen, even when it doesn’t look like it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is trusting that everything happens for a reason.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is the courage to face the unknown with hope and trust.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is the belief that something better is on the horizon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is the light that guides us when we can’t see the way.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is not something you find, but something you develop, for it grows with every trial.

quotes.quote: The strength of your faith is measured by the patience in your heart.

quotes.quote: True faith is to trust in Allah even when things are not going as you hoped.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When you have faith in Allah, you don’t need to worry about anything else.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is knowing that Allah’s plan is better than your own.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your faith will be tested, but remember, the one who believes in Allah’s wisdom will always find peace.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith in Allah’s timing is what keeps us patient in difficult times.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is not simply a belief; it is an unwavering trust in Allah’s wisdom and mercy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith in Allah is like a tree with deep roots that stay strong even in storms.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: True faith is not the absence of doubts, but the courage to move forward despite them, trusting in Allah.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Strengthen your faith and let Allah handle the rest.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The key to success is faith in Allah and trusting that He will guide you through.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your faith will always give you the strength to keep going, no matter what happens.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: With faith in Allah, the darkest days will pass and the light of His mercy will guide you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith in Allah is the greatest source of peace in any situation.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Trust in Allah’s plan, for His wisdom is greater than our understanding.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is not measured by your ability to understand, but by your ability to trust in Allah’s will.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is when you trust Allah even when you don’t see the way forward.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A believer is never alone, for his faith in Allah is always with him.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your faith is your refuge. In times of hardship, trust Allah and He will never abandon you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith in Allah allows you to be at peace, even when the world is in chaos.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your parents are the closest reflection of Allah’s mercy on earth.

quotes.quote: The love of a mother is the veil of paradise for her child.

quotes.quote: The greatest gift you can give to your children is your time, love, and patience.

quotes.quote: Heaven lies at the feet of your mother.

quotes.quote: The best way to repay your parents is by taking care of them when they are old.

quotes.quote: Parents are the first teachers, and their children are the first students.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A mother’s heart is a patchwork of love.

quotes.quote: Behind every great child is a mother who believes in them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A father’s love is like an anchor that keeps the family grounded.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Parents are the roots of a child’s future.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Parents hold their children’s hands for a while, but their hearts forever.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It’s not the things we do for our children that matter most, it’s the love we give them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A mother’s love is eternal, and a father’s love is a solid foundation.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Parents are the first teachers, shaping the minds of future generations.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Children are the greatest blessing from Allah, and parents are their greatest teachers.

quotes.quote: You don’t have to be perfect, just be a good parent.

quotes.quote: A parent’s love is the foundation for a child’s happiness and success.

quotes.quote: The best inheritance a parent can give to their children is a good education and strong moral values.

quotes.quote: Parents who are loving and nurturing make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your parents are the closest thing to Allah’s mercy on earth.

quotes.quote: The hands that rocked the cradle are the hands that shape the world.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A parent’s job is not to make life easy for their children, but to teach them how to overcome challenges.

quotes.quote: Your parents are your first love and your forever source of strength.

quotes.quote: A father is someone you look up to no matter how tall you grow.

quotes.quote: The greatest gift a father can give to his children is a strong example of integrity and love.

quotes.quote: Parents are like the stars that guide their children in life’s darkest moments.

quotes.quote: Parents are the anchors that hold the family together in the stormy seas of life.

quotes.quote: Your parents’ wisdom and love are a priceless treasure, cherish it.

quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The loss of time is a greater loss than the loss of wealth.

quotes.quote: Time is like a sword. If you do not use it properly, it will destroy you.

quotes.quote: The key to success is to use time for productive actions that bring you closer to Allah.

quotes.quote: A day wasted is a day you will never see again.

quotes.quote: Time is like a sword: if you don’t use it, it will cut you.

quotes.quote: Time is precious. It’s your most valuable asset; spend it wisely in the service of others.

quotes.quote: Use your time to make an impact in the lives of others, and seek Allah's pleasure.

quotes.quote: Your actions today shape your future. Time is a reflection of your choices.

quotes.quote: Time is your most precious resource. Spend it in a way that pleases Allah.

quotes.quote: Do not wait for the right time. Time does not wait for anyone.

quotes.quote: The time you waste is a regret you will carry forever. Use it wisely.

quotes.quote: Time is the most valuable thing a person can have. Do not waste it in vain pursuits.

quotes.quote: The reward of time used in the service of Allah is immeasurable.

quotes.quote: Every second is a chance to change your life. Make the most of it.

quotes.quote: Time is like a thread. Once it’s cut, you cannot reconnect it.

quotes.quote: Do not let time slip away unnoticed. The value of every moment is great.

quotes.quote: Time is the capital of life. Don’t spend it on things that do not yield good results.

quotes.quote: Wealth can be lost, but time cannot be regained once it is gone.

quotes.quote: Take advantage of every moment, for time is fleeting and never comes back.

quotes.quote: Time is the most precious gift given to you. Do not waste it.

quotes.quote: The wise person knows the value of time and uses it to enrich their soul and serve humanity.

quotes.quote: Time is like a running river. It does not stop for anyone.

quotes.quote: Every breath you take is a precious moment. Do not waste it.

quotes.quote: The time you spend seeking knowledge is never wasted.

quotes.quote: Time is an investment. Invest it wisely in good deeds.

quotes.quote: You are the master of your time, use it to shape your destiny.

quotes.quote: When you realize the value of time, you will never waste it again.
